author: robbie
msg: QPID-4858: Prevent silent use of insecure HTTP connector when HTTP protocol with SSL transport was requested.
Remove separate HTTPS protocol and use HTTP protocol with SSL transport for consistency with all other protocol types.

msg: QPID-4851: Allow users to access http management using '/' instead of forcing them to type '/management' or '/index.html'

msg: QPID-4868: Add UI into web management console to edit JMX management configuration

msg: QPID-4862: Improve registration/unregistration for JMX MBean objects
